try.command: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT CLNT_PLAN_GRP_ID, DLVRY_SYS_CD, PB_ID, EFF_DT, EXPRN_DT, SRC_HSC_TS, SRC_HSU_TS from (SELECT CLNT_PLAN_GRP_ID, DLVRY_SYS_CD, PB_ID, EFF_DT, EXPRN_DT, to_date(to_char(SRC_HSC_TS,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as SRC_HSC_TS, to_date(to_char(SRC_HSU_TS,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as SRC_HSU_TS, row_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CLNT_PLAN_GRP_ID,DLVRY_SYS_CD,PB_ID,EFF_DT ORDER BY CLNT_PLAN_GRP_ID,DLVRY_SYS_CD,PB_ID,EFF_DT) AS ROW_NUM FROM DWCORP.T_QL_CPG_PLAN_BNFT_TRSLN_HIST ) a where a.ROW_NUM = 1 )

command.source: SELECT CLNT_PLAN_GRP_ID, DLVRY_SYS_CD, PB_ID, EFF_DT, EXPRN_DT, SRC_HSC_TS, SRC_HSU_TS from (SELECT CLNT_PLAN_GRP_ID, DLVRY_SYS_CD, PB_ID, EFF_DT, EXPRN_DT, to_date(to_char(SRC_HSC_TS,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as SRC_HSC_TS, to_date(to_char(SRC_HSU_TS,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'),'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as SRC_HSU_TS, row_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CLNT_PLAN_GRP_ID,DLVRY_SYS_CD,PB_ID,EFF_DT ORDER BY CLNT_PLAN_GRP_ID,DLVRY_SYS_CD,PB_ID,EFF_DT) AS ROW_NUM FROM DWCORP.T_QL_CPG_PLAN_BNFT_TRSLN_HIST ) a where a.ROW_NUM = 1
command.target: INSERT INTO rps.TQL_TCPG_PB_TRL_HIST (CLT_PLAN_GROUP_ID, DELIVERY_SYSTEM_CD, PB_ID, EFF_DT, EXP_DT, HSC_TS, HSU_TS ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

catch.command:
[ERROR] REFESH TQL_TCPG_PB_TRL_HIST
